body:
Comment 1: 
The spec at http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html
still mentions closed because that site shows the
content of the last "release" tag, and the release
still has closed.

You can always see the spec that matches the
build you are using by running godoc -http=:8080
and then loading http://localhost:8080/doc/go_spec.html
in your browser.

Russ
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
